metadata.title: CVE-2023-23922 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The vulnerability was found Moodle which exists due to insufficientsanitization of user-supplied data in blog search. A remote attacker cantrick the victim to follow a specially crafted link and execute arbitraryHTML and script code in user's browser in context of vulnerable website.This flaw allows a remote attacker to perform cross-site scripting (XSS)attacks.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
